description: Natural resource management tour of Central, Northern and Tropical Queensland to provide an appreciation of different management contexts including social, cultural, legal, economic, political and ecological perspectives within which management is conducted. Quota applies due to transport constraints. For further information, and to express your interest in applying for this course, please see the School's website (https://sees.uq.edu.au/student-support/student-field-trips). Additional fees payable. In the event that students complete the fieldwork and then subsequently withdraw from this course without financial liability, the School reserves the right to charge full cost recovery for this field trip.
incompatible: LPWM3003, LPWM7016, LPWM3004, ENVM7529, ENVM3105, ENVM3106, ENVM3105, ENVM7529
restricted: Permission of Head of School required. Minimum enrolment quota of 15 students.
